jiwithe palumu parata dakapu minissu godak ineth katada kiyanne dahasakuth prashna .barima thana aha arala baladdi mage eha paththe his wela thibunu shit ekaka innawa ara kalin mawa shit ekata thiyala gata gahanna hadapu ee sundari.ee wage kellek gen kohomada man katak arala kiyanne kan kakkumak thiyenawa behethak denna kiyala.ethakota ee kella man gana monawa hithawida meka kollekda kankakumak iwasanna barida thawa thawa amuthu eewath hithuwoth dahasakuth wikara sithuwili mada man tika welawak athara man una eeth enna ennama wedanawa wadi wenawa.oonadeyak hithapu den meyawa aye dakinneth nahane man matama banagena chanchala unu sitha nishchala karanagaman man mage ee amaruwa kiwa (mage honda welawata shri lankan ekaka giye nathnam wenath ekaka giyanam man kohomada eka kiyanne kan kakumata ingrisiyen kiyana widiya danne na)

man aththatama kamathiwune naha nayakathwaya bara ganna.mokada mage kisima adahasak thibune naha.di.es.ayiya kathakarala kiwwa mata masa 6k adala denna.engalanthedi mage athata bole wadila agilla kadunata passe hitapu nayakayinta kiwwa nayakathwaya karanna kiyala baha kiwwa.anjelo mathiws man nayakathwaya karapu awurudda purama ohuta pandu yawanna bari prashnayak thibuna.kaf eke abadhayak thibuna awurudda purawata.mage awasanawa wenna athi eeka.mokada mama ayinwela sathiyak yanakota api ostreliyawata giya,ee sathiyedi mathiws pandu yawanna patan gaththa.eeka mahelage wasanawa wenna athi mage awasanawa wenna athi.kridakayingen witharak neweyi hitapu samahara puhunukaruwongeth ee de labune naha.mokada man nayakathwaya daraddi puhunukaruwo hatharadenek pasdenek withara hitiya.ee awurudda athulatha.

ranmihithanna jathyantharayata gena giya sundara rathriyaranmihithanna nila web adawiya janadhipathithuma athin wiwrutha wu awasthawa.janamadhya amathya keheliya rambaukwalla, parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha, janamadhya amathyanshaye lekam charitha rathwaththa yana mahathwaru da me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.pekshakayin hata honda chithrapatayak, honda telinatyayak idiripath kirimata nirmanakaruwan ganne aparimitha uthsahayaki; wehesaki.ema uthsahaye wehesa mahansiye wadima kotasak waya wanne sandaha awashya pasuthala soya ganimataya.nirmanakaruwange ema wehesa awama kirime aramunin mita wasara 3 kata pera enam 2010 marthu 30 wanida ranmihithanna mahinda rajapaksha teli sinama gammanaya wiwrutha wiya.sabawinma eya sinamawata, rupawahini kshethrayata mahinda rajapaksha rajaya labidun kadima aayojanayaki.
